mapper.insert: insert into job(jobdicSeq, profession, summary, similarJob, salery, equalemployment, totalCount, aptd_type_code, prospect, job_ctg_code, job_code, job, possibility) values( #{jobdicSeq}, #{profession}, #{summary}, #{similarJob}, #{salery}, #{equalemployment}, #{totalCount}, #{aptd_type_code}, #{prospect}, #{job_ctg_code}, #{job_code}, #{job}, #{possibility})
mapper.select: select * from job order by binary(job)
